plot: Thirty years after the historic 1984 NBA Draft, comes a documentary from NBA TV outlining the details of that fateful night and the years that followed.
title: The84Draft
plot_es: Thirty years after the historic 1984 NBA Draft, comes a documentary from NBA TV outlining the details of that fateful night and the years that followed.
plot_en: Thirty years after the historic 1984 NBA Draft, comes a documentary from NBA TV outlining the details of that fateful night and the years that followed.
